<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript"> AJS.$.namespace("AJS.gadget.bamboo.charts"); /** * Chart gadget. * * @module Chart */ (function () { AJS.gadget.bamboo.charts.Chart = function (baseUrl) { var PREF_PLAN = 'plan'; var PREF_GROUP_BY_PERIOD = 'groupByPeriod'; var PREF_FILTER = 'dateFilter'; var ReportType = { title : {} }; /** * Extract all gadget preferences */ var getAllPrefsMap = function(gadget) { var prefs = {}; prefs[PREF_GROUP_BY_PERIOD] = gadget.getPref(PREF_GROUP_BY_PERIOD); prefs[PREF_PLAN] = gadget.getPrefArray(PREF_PLAN); prefs[PREF_FILTER] = gadget.getPref(PREF_FILTER); return prefs; }; /** * Shall be called in the context of gadget * @param prefs * @param gadget */ var generateChart = function(prefs) { var gadget = this; var reqOptions = { url: "/rest/api/latest/chart/planSummary.json", data: { "buildKeys": prefs[PREF_PLAN], "groupByPeriod": prefs[PREF_GROUP_BY_PERIOD], "dateFilter": prefs[PREF_FILTER], "dateFrom": "", "dateTo": "", "width": Math.floor(gadgets.window.getViewportDimensions().width * 0.8), "height": Math.floor(gadgets.window.getViewportDimensions().width * 2 / 3), "nocache": Math.floor(new Date().getTime()) }, success: function(response) { if (response.location.length > 0) { gadget.getView().append(AJS.gadget.bamboo.buildChartDiv(baseUrl, response)); } else { gadget.getView().append(AJS.gadget.bamboo.buildNoBuildResultsForSelectedPlanDiv(gadget)); } gadget.getView().append(AJS.gadget.bamboo.generateFooter(baseUrl)); gadget.hideLoading(); gadgets.window.adjustHeight(); } }; AJS.$.ajax(reqOptions); }; // extend configurable gadget var gadget = AJS.Gadget({ baseUrl: baseUrl, useOauth: '/rest/api/1.0/currentUser', config: { descriptor: function (args) { return { action: "", theme : AJS.gadget.bamboo.getConfigTheme(), fields: [ AJS.gadget.bamboo.config.generateSelectPlan(gadget, PREF_PLAN, args.plans), { type: "select", userpref: PREF_GROUP_BY_PERIOD, selected: gadget.getPref(PREF_GROUP_BY_PERIOD), label: gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.chartType.label"), options: [ { value: AJS.gadget.bamboo.config.groupBy.MONTH, label: AJS.format(gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.chartType.successRateAndDuration"), gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.groupBy.month")) }, { value: AJS.gadget.bamboo.config.groupBy.WEEK, label: AJS.format(gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.chartType.successRateAndDuration"), gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.groupBy.week")) }, { value: AJS.gadget.bamboo.config.groupBy.DAY, label: AJS.format(gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.chartType.successRateAndDuration"), gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.groupBy.day")) }, { value: AJS.gadget.bamboo.config.groupBy.AUTO, label: AJS.format(gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.chartType.successRateAndDuration"), gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.groupBy.auto")) }, { value: AJS.gadget.bamboo.config.groupBy.BUILD_NUMBER, label: AJS.format(gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.chartType.durationAndFailedTestsCount"), gadget.getMsg("gadget.config.groupBy.buildNumber")) } ] }, AJS.gadget.bamboo.config.generateSelectDateAndBuildNumberFilter(gadget, PREF_FILTER), { userpref: AJS.gadget.bamboo.config.PREF_IS_CONFIGURED, type: "hidden", value: "true" } ] }; }, args: [ { key: "plans", ajaxOptions: function () { return { url: "/rest/api/latest/plan.json", data: { "expand": "plans", "max-results": "1000", "nocache": Math.floor(new Date().getTime()) } }; } }, ] }, view: { template: function (args) { var gadget = this; gadget.getView().empty(); gadget.showLoading(); var prefs = getAllPrefsMap(gadget); var title = AJS.format(gadget.getMsg("gadget.charts.planSummary.title"), prefs[PREF_PLAN]); gadgets.window.setTitle(title); generateChart.call(gadget, prefs); }, args: [{ key: "reports", ajaxOptions: function () { return { url: "/rest/api/latest/chart/reports.json", data: { "expand": "reports", "max-results": "1000", "nocache": Math.floor(new Date().getTime()) } }; } }], enableReload: true, onResizeReload: true, onResizeAdjustHeight: true } }); return gadget; }; }()); AJS.gadget.bamboo.charts.Chart.init = function() { var gadget = AJS.gadget.bamboo.charts.Chart("http://192.168.2.198:8085"); }; // Set onload handler gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(AJS.gadget.bamboo.charts.Chart.init); </script>
